dict.string: The various regional warlords formally acknowledged his legitimacy but never took action to save him from being held hostage.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Xian_of_Han
Even after he grew to adulthood, he was not interested in governmental affairs
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Ling_of_Han
He was poisoned to death by the powerful official Liang Ji
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Huan_of_Han
He was remarkably intelligent and he knew and was offended by the immense power Liang Ji had over the government
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Zhi_of_Han
He ascended the throne at the age of one and reigned less than six months
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Chong_of_Han
His personality was mild, just as incompetent as his father in general
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Shun_of_Han
He removed many of her relatives from government and many of them committed suicide
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_An_of_Han
He ascended the throne at the age of nine and reigned for 17 years
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_He_of_Han
Under him, Han society prospered and its culture flourished during this period.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Zhang_of_Han
He was a hard-working, able administrator of the empire who showed integrity and demanded integrity from his officials
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Ming_of_Han
He established his capital in Luoyang
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Guangwu_of_Han
He was viewed as a weak and incompetent ruler, who briefly ruled over an empire willing to let him rule over them, but was unable to keep that empire together
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gengshi_Emperor_of_Han
He seized the throne from the Liu family and founded the Xin Dynasty
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wang_Mang
He is often viewed as an innocent child who was the victim of tragic circumstances
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruzi_Ying
From here onwards, the Han Dynasty existed only in name
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Ping_of_Han
He was viewed by people to be intelligent, articulate, and capable at the beginning
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Ai_of_Han
Under him, corruptions and greedy officials continued to plague the government and as a result rebellions broke out throughout the country
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Cheng_of_Han
He was remembered for the promotion of Confucianism as the official creed of Chinese government
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Yuan_of_Han
His life story was a riches-to-rags-to-riches story
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Xuan_of_Han
He took the initiative of the previous emperor and lowered taxes as well as reduced government spending
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Zhao_of_Han
He was known for his religious innovations and patronage of the poetic and musical arts, including development of the imperial Music Bureau into a prestigious entity
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Wu_of_Han
He managed to crush the revolt and princes were thereafter denied rights to appoint ministers for their fiefs
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Jing_of_Han
He introduced recruitment to the civil service through examinations
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Wen_of_Han
His brother was secretly imprisoned within the palace and publicly announced that he was severely ill and unable to receive anyone
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Houshao_of_Han
He was considered to be a mere puppet of Grand Empress Dowager Lu
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor_Qianshao_of_Han
He was generally remembered as a weak character dominated by his mother, Empress Dowager LÃ¼, personally kind and generous but unable to escape the impact of her viciousness

He was one of the few dynasty founders in Chinese history with humble origin from the peasant class
